name: Geode Nightly
subtitle: Try out the new versions of Geode, earlier
description: Geode is a mod loader for Geometry Dash, this is the Nightly version, meaning that you use the beta upcoming version of Geode.

apps.name: Geode (nightly)
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.
